            • isLocked

              public boolean isLocked()
              control layer by isLocked handle view visibility
              • false: handle all interaction view show/hide
              • true: handle lock interaction view show/hide

              • setLocked

                Set control group locked

                locked:

                • control layer locked
                • disable orientation helper
                • intercept dispatch KeyEvent
                • disable gesture detector

                • getShowTimeoutMs

                  public int getShowTimeoutMs()
                  Returns the controlGroupView timeout. The controlGroupView are automatically hidden after this duration of time has elapsed without user input.
                  Returns:
                  The duration in milliseconds. A non-positive value indicates that the controlGroupView will remain visible indefinitely.

                • setShowTimeoutMs

                  public void setShowTimeoutMs(int showTimeoutMs)
                  Sets the controlGroupView timeout. The controlGroupView are automatically hidden after this duration of time has elapsed without user input.
                  Parameters:
                  showTimeoutMs - The duration in milliseconds. A non-positive value will cause the controlGroupView to remain visible indefinitely.
